php.SEC_MODULE_DONT_HAVE_SECURITY_RIGHT: Module/action excluded from verification of permissions
php.SEC_NO_ACTION_MODULE_PERMISSIONS_YES: Permissions to module, user has access to this module's data
php.SEC_RECORD_ID_IS_NULL: General access to actions in module
php.SEC_MODULE_RIGHTS_TO_ACTION: Access based on permissions to perform actions in the module
php.SEC_RECORD_BY_SHARING_YES: Access based on access rules (Module access)
php.SEC_RECORD_OWNER_SUBORDINATE_USER: Access based on company's hierarchy (roles), user is higher in hierarchy than record owner
php.SEC_NO_ACTION_MODULE_PERMISSIONS_NO: No permissions to module, user has no access to the module
php.SEC_MODULE_PERMISSIONS_NO: No permissions to module, user has no access to the module
php.SEC_MODULE_NO_RIGHTS_TO_ACTION: No permissions to perform actions in the module
php.SEC_RECORD_BY_SHARING_NO: No permissions based on access rules (Module access)
php.SEC_MODULE_NO_ACTION_TOOL: No permissions for action - Action not found
